name: LaVega - The Nano
additionalNotes: LaVega Cigars is much more than just a brand of cigarettes. It is the culmination of a dream, a passion and a deep connection with the tobacco tradition. Founded by Aaron, a cigar enthusiast with a rich history in the world of music and gastronomy, LaVega represents a personal journey and a tribute to his Italian roots and his time in Las Vegas. Each LaVega cigar is handcrafted, following traditional methods and using the finest tobacco leaves and blends from LaVega offer a complex and balanced taste experience, with spicy notes and sweet touches.
